problem.markdown:
>>What three data pre-processing steps can be done in the Query Editor?<<
[ ] Rename source file [x] Remove columns [x] Split column [x] Replace values
[explanation] You cannot rename the source file from the Query Editor. [explanation]
problem.p: What three data pre-processing steps can be done in the Query Editor?

checkboxgroup.label: What three data pre-processing steps can be done in the Query Editor?

div.p: You cannot rename the source file from the Query Editor.
